title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 62.1 - Filing of reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 62.1 - Filing of reports

State Regulations

All cases or suspected cases of Alzheimer's disease and related disorders shall be reported to the Commissioner of Health by physicians, hospital administrators, laboratories, or persons in charge of the State institutions, pathologists, coroners and medical examiners. Reports shall be made in a manner and on forms prescribed by the commissioner. Penalties for not reporting are provided in section
12
of the Public Health Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
62.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
